name: Tempo Wizard
description:
Tempo Wizard is a funny four beats plan battle game.
Control a wizard and tries to kill each other. Use your wits to outfox your opponent.
2 Game Modes: Single player and Two players.

Game Control:
Input Actions to Start

1P
Up: W
Left: A
Down: S
Right: D
Mage Arrow: F


2P
Up: Up
Left: Left
Down: Down
Right: Right
Mage Arrow: K
